prs.title: 🗞️ Hyperliquid OFT variant for ease of transfer to Hyperliquid L1 via lzCompose
prs.truncated_body:
# What is the HYPE regarding this PR?

## Pre-requisite knowledge that may help
`HyperCore` (a closed source L1) and `HyperEVM` (also a closed source EVM network) act as a unified network (HyperLiquid) tailored for `DeFi` - spots and perp trading uses precompiles and specific addresses.

The EVM network - `HyperEVM` is used to on and off ramp tokens and liquidity into the `HyperCore`. The `Hy

Use a local erc20 abi for calling `erc20.tokens()` instead of reading it from the deployments file

prs.title: Hashing and prefetching hints for fd_map_chain_para
prs.truncated_body:
By popular demand.  This is nearly identical to the hinting support already in fd_map_slot_para.  Also:

- Support for hashless prefetching in fd_map_slot_para.

- Some minor documentation clarifications in fd_map_slot_para.

- Drive by cleanup to slight improve load balance for FD_FOR_ALL / FD_MAP_REDUCE.

commits.message:
Hashing and prefetching hints for fd_map_chain_para

By popular demand.  This is nearly identical to the hinting support
already in fd_map_slot_para.  Also:

- Support for hashless prefetching in fd_map_slot_para.

- Some minor documentation clarifications in fd_map_slot_para.

- Drive by cleanup to slight improve load balance for FD_FOR_ALL /
  FD_MAP_REDUCE.

prs.title: fix(staking): remove max retries from wallet tester
prs.truncated_body: Instead, we will now use the default behavior from `@pythnetwork/solana-utils`, which aligns with what the staking sdk does and is to keep retrying until either the tx is successfully completed OR the user kills the app.

commits.message:
fix(staking): remove max retries from wallet tester

Instead, we will now use the default behavior from `@pythnetwork/solana-utils`,
which aligns with what the staking sdk does and is to keep retrying until either
the tx is successfully completed OR the user kills the app.

prs.title: Add config option to skip some validator checks for testing
prs.truncated_body:
This change adds a config option to skip the following checks on HIGH and CRITICAL validators/orgs:
* That these orgs consist of at least 3 validators
* That these validators have history archives.

This option is only available on test builds. It is useful in supercluser where we may want to test application-specific functionality without spinning up fully valid networks.

commits.message:
Add config option to skip some validator checks for testing

This change adds a config option to skip the following checks on HIGH
and CRITICAL validators/orgs:
* That these orgs consist of at least 3 validators
* That these validators have history archives.

This option is only available on test builds. It is useful in
supercluser where we may want to test application-specific
functionality without spinning up fully valid networks.
